seo.title: Kupferhof Rosental | Exclusive Event Location in Stolberg
seo.description: Celebrate unforgettable weddings and events at the historic Kupferhof Rosental in Stolberg (Rhld.). Unique ambiance for your special moments.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Everything for your perfect day in Stolberg

0.title: Exclusive Celebrations
0.description: From intimate receptions to grand wedding parties in the ballroom. We create unforgettable moments for you and your guests.

1.title: Outdoor Weddings
1.description: Say "I do" in our picturesque rose garden or in the historic courtyard ambiance. Pure romance in the heart of the Aachen region.

2.title: Corporate Events
2.description: Inspiring meetings and conferences in a historic setting. Impress your clients and employees with a unique location.

about.title: A historic jewel in the heart of the Vichtbach Valley
about.p1: Kupferhof Rosental looks back on a long tradition. Once the heart of Stolberg's copper industry, it is now one of the most exclusive wedding venues in the Aachen region.
about.p2: The lovingly restored buildings and the extensive park offer a unique atmosphere for your special day. Just a few minutes from Aachen, you will find peace, elegance, and historic flair here. Whether a free wedding ceremony in the rose garden or a festive dinner in the ballroom – we make your dreams come true.

stats.title: Why Kupferhof Rosental?
stats.subtitle: Excellence down to the smallest detail

seo.title: Exclusive Weddings at Kupferhof Rosental | Stolberg
seo.description: Celebrate your dream wedding in a historic ambiance. Tailor-made concepts, exquisite catering, and unforgettable moments.

header.title: Your Wedding.
header.subtitle: A day as unique as your love. Celebrate in the historic ambiance of Kupferhof Rosental.

intro.title:
Writing History.
Together.
intro.text1: There are places you keep in your heart forever. Kupferhof Rosental is such a place. Located in the heart of Stolberg, our historic walls combine centuries-old tradition with modern elegance.
intro.text2: Whether an intimate ceremony in a small circle or a lavish party until dawn – we create the perfect setting for your big day. Let yourself be enchanted by the magic of our courtyard and enjoy the luxury of being a host in one of the region's most exclusive locations.

features.title: Everything for Your Perfect Day
features.subtitle: We take care of the details so you can focus on what matters most: Saying I do.

0.title: Free Ceremony
0.desc: Our romantic courtyard or stylish halls offer the perfect backdrop for your emotional ceremony.

1.title: Exquisite Catering
1.desc: From champagne reception to midnight snack – our culinary partners spoil you and your guests at the highest level.

2.title: Party Until Dawn
2.desc: No curfew, no compromises. Our state-of-the-art light and sound technology ensures the party of your life.

0.title: Grand Ballroom
0.desc: Up to 120 people seated. High ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, and direct access to the terrace.

1.title: Fireplace Room
1.desc: For an intimate reception or as a lounge area. Cozy atmosphere with a real fireplace.

2.title: Courtyard
2.desc: The perfect place for your champagne reception or an open-air ceremony.

seo.title: The Location | Kupferhof Rosental
seo.description: Discover the premises of Kupferhof Rosental. Historic charm meets modern comfort in Stolberg.

header.title: The Kupferhof.
header.subtitle: An architectural jewel in the heart of Stolberg. Discover rooms with character.

intro.title: Walls That Tell Stories.
intro.text: Kupferhof Rosental is more than just a building. It is a testament to Stolberg's flourishing copper master era. Lovingly restored, it today combines the rough charm of the industrial monument with the elegance of a modern event location.

0.title: The Grand Ballroom
0.desc: Our centerpiece. With its high ceilings, noble parquet floor, and light-flooded windows, the ballroom offers an ambiance of timeless elegance. Ideal for large banquets, weddings, and lectures.

1.title: The Fireplace Room
1.desc: Intimate and cozy. The fireplace room with its open fireplace is the perfect retreat for smaller groups, receptions, or as a stylish lounge during your big celebration.

2.title: The Courtyard
2.desc: A piece of Italy in Stolberg. Our protected courtyard offers privacy under the open sky. Perfect for free weddings, champagne receptions, or relaxed get-togethers on mild summer evenings.

visit.title: Visit Us
visit.text: Pictures say a lot, but the feeling of standing in our rooms is irreplaceable. Arrange a viewing appointment.

seo.title: Culinary & Catering | Kupferhof Rosental
seo.description: Moments of pleasure for your event. Exquisite catering, fine wines, and first-class service at Kupferhof Rosental.

header.title: Culinary.
header.subtitle: Love goes through the stomach. Let yourself and your guests be pampered.

intro.title: A Feast for the Senses.
intro.text1: We believe that good food is the soul of every celebration. That is why we work exclusively with selected catering partners who share our high standards of quality, freshness, and creativity.
intro.text2: Whether a rustic BBQ in the courtyard, an elegant 5-course menu, or a trendy flying buffet – we create the perfect culinary concept for your event together with you.

seo.title: Stay | Kupferhof Rosental
seo.description: Relax in our exclusive suites. Historic charm meets modern comfort. Stay at Kupferhof Rosental.

header.title: Suites & Rooms.
header.subtitle: Find peace after a lavish party. Dream amidst history.

accommodation.intro: Our guest rooms combine the character of the historic Kupferhof with contemporary luxury. Each room is unique, lovingly furnished with selected materials and an eye for detail.

suite.title: The Wedding Suite
suite.desc: Spacious and flooded with light. Our wedding suite offers the bridal couple a retreat in a class of its own. With freestanding bathtub, king-size bed, and a breathtaking view of the courtyard.

guest.title: Guest Rooms
guest.desc: Further stylish double rooms are available for your closest family and friends. So you can end the celebration together at breakfast the next morning.

seo.title: About Us | Kupferhof Rosental
seo.description: Meet the team behind Kupferhof Rosental. Our philosophy, our history, and our passion for events.

header.title: About Us.
header.subtitle: A place with history. A team with passion.

intro.title: Our Philosophy
intro.text1: Hospitality is more than just a word for us – it is an attitude. We see ourselves not only as landlords of a location but as hosts with passion.
intro.text2: Our goal is to create an atmosphere for every guest in which they feel welcome and secure. We love details, we value quality, and we live for the moment when a plan turns into an unforgettable experience.

team.caption: The Kupferhof Rosental team looks forward to meeting you.

history.title: History
history.text: Kupferhof Rosental looks back on centuries of history. Once built as a production site for brass, the walls still bear witness to the busy activity of past eras today. Careful restoration has preserved the industrial charm and combined it with modern elegance.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: We act responsibly. Regional products for catering, energy-efficient technology, and respectful treatment of the historic building fabric are a matter of course for us.

intro.title: General Terms and Conditions
intro.text: For the rental of conference, banquet, and event rooms of Kupferhof Rosental for holding events as well as for all further associated services and deliveries.

1.title: 1. Scope of Applicability
1.text1: 1.1 These terms and conditions apply to contracts for the rental of conference, banquet, and event rooms of Kupferhof Rosental for holding events as well as for all further associated services and deliveries of the organizer.
1.text2: 1.2 The subletting or re-letting of the provided rooms as well as the invitation to interviews, sales or similar events maintain the prior written consent.

2.title: 2. Conclusion of Contract, Partners, Liability
2.text1: 2.1 The contract is concluded by the acceptance of the customer's application by Kupferhof Rosental.
2.text2: 2.2 The contracting parties are Kupferhof Rosental and the customer.

3.title: 3. Services, Prices, Payment, Set-off
3.text1: 3.1 Kupferhof Rosental is obliged to provide the services ordered by the customer and promised by it.
3.text2: 3.2 The customer is obliged to pay the agreed or applicable prices for these and other services used.

seo.index_description: Latest news, wedding inspiration, and behind-the-scenes insights from Kupferhof Rosental.

header.title: Journal.
header.subtitle: Stories, inspiration, and news from the Kupferhof.

posts.title: Magical Winter Weddings: Pure Romance at Kupferhof
posts.excerpt: Why a winter wedding has its very own magic and how we perfectly showcase it at Kupferhof Rosental.
posts.content:
When snowflakes dance outside and the historic courtyard is bathed in white light, Kupferhof Rosental unfolds a very special magic. Winter weddings are becoming increasingly popular – and for good reason.

Coziness Meets Elegance

Unlike summer, where heat often weighs down, winter offers the opportunity for cozy moments. Our fireplace room with its crackling fire is the perfect place for the champagne reception. Candlelight, warm colors, and heavy fabrics create an atmosphere of comfort and luxury.

Culinary Highlights

Culinarily, winter allows for heartier and more intense flavors. Game dishes, winter root vegetables, and of course a dessert buffet with cinnamon, baked apples, and chocolate make guests' hearts beat faster.
posts.author: Anna Rosental

posts.title: Green Events: Sustainability at Your Event
posts.excerpt: How you can design your event in an environmentally conscious way without sacrificing style and exclusivity.
posts.content:
Sustainability is not a trend, but a necessity. At Kupferhof Rosental, we actively work to conserve resources.

This starts with selecting our catering partners, who primarily use regional and seasonal products, and extends to our energy concept.
posts.author: Team Rosental

posts.title: Event Trends 2026: What's Coming, What's Staying?
posts.excerpt: An outlook on the colors, shapes, and concepts that will shape the upcoming event year.
posts.content:
The year 2026 is all about individuality. "Micro-weddings" – small but extremely high-quality celebrations – continue to trend.

In terms of color, we see a return to strong earth tones (terracotta, moss green) combined with metallic accents in copper and bronze – which of course perfectly matches our location.
posts.author: Lina Design
